title: Fors Sale-Single Family Home with Pool & Detached Studio
description:
This move-in-ready modern family residence is located in the sought-after area of Grote Berg, offering comfort, privacy, and excellent investment potential. Built on 715 m² of owned land, the property combines contemporary design with functional living spaces, ideal for both permanent residence and rental opportunities.

The main home features an open-plan layout with a spacious living and dining area, seamlessly connected to a gourmet kitchen designed for both daily living and entertaining. Large sliding doors open to a covered back porch, where you can enjoy cooling trade winds and peaceful sunset views overlooking the private swimming pool.

A detached studio adds significant value, making this property attractive for short- or long-term rental income, a guest house, or a private home office.


Property Features:
Main Residence:

715 m² owned land

3 air-conditioned bedrooms

2 modern bathrooms, including a spacious en-suite

Open-plan living and dining area with air-conditioning

Large covered back porch with sunset views


Gourmet Kitchen:

Cooking island with integrated pop-up charging station

Built-in wine cooler

Separate grill

Extractor hood

Soft-close drawers and cabinets

Integrated spice racks

Built-in waste disposal system


Outdoor & Additional Features:

Private swimming pool

Detached studio (ideal for rental income or guest accommodation)

Outdoor storage room

Separate laundry area

Furniture available for purchase

Recent valuation report available

Move-in ready condition

Location
Grote Berg is a popular residential area on Curaçao, known for its quiet surroundings, good accessibility, and proximity to Willemstad, beaches, and major road connections. This makes the property suitable for families, professionals, and investors alike.
